content: this free pattern is for a easy to knit tube dress this is beginner friendly materials 8ply yarn used 4 seasons marvel 2mm needles tapestry needle abbreviations k - knit p - purl inc1 - increase by knitting into front and back of the same stitch k2tog - deceease by knitting two stitches together to fit 29cm fashion doll with modern standard body like barbie this dress is knitted from the bottom in stocking stitch happy knitting #hkchappyknitting
